short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks input in the YouTube search bar in the specified language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Language Search Shield is a Chrome extension designed to enhance language learning by restricting searches on YouTube in specific languages. By allowing users to select one or more languages to block, this extension prevents learners from inadvertently searching for and watching videos in their native or familiar languages, encouraging greater immersion in their target language(s) instead. Stay focused and make the most of your language-learning journey!
